en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Melaka Police Day Golf Event, 24th May 2009!
en.content:
REPORT BY FUSIONEXCEL LEADER MR LIEW. 

The Charity Golf Event "Sumbangan Untuk Aktivitiy Sambutan Peringatan Hari Polis Ke 202 Anjuran Kontinjen Melaka" started with a big "Bang" by FusionExcel's Spokesman Mr Jean Daniels when he started his Demonstration/Presentation at 8am in front of a big crowd. 

One of the golfers was given the chance to show off his skill to hit a golf ball placed on top of a modified 2 feet golf iron. Everyone including the Honorable Governor of Melaka Tuan Yang Terutama Yang Dipertua Negeri Melaka Tun Datuk Seri Utama Mohd. Khalil Bin Yaakob, the Honorable Chief Minister of Melaka Yang Amat Berhormat Datuk Seri Hj. Mohd. Ali Bin Mohd. Rustam, the Honorable Chief Police Officer Of Melaka Datuk Mazlan Mansor burst into laughter when the golfer hit the 2 feet iron and NOT the golf ball! The Honorable Governor of Melaka then started off the Golf tournament. This year's Police Day theme is the participation of the public with the police to have closer ties and co-operation between the Police and the public in crime prevention. One of the activities to promote this cooperation is through this Golf Tournament.

Among the VIP guests who played that day were the Honorable Governor of Melaka, the Honorable Director of Commercial Crime Investigation Department Dato' Koh Hong Sun, the Honorable Director of Law and Order Dato' Husin Ismail and the Honorable CPO Of Melaka Datuk Mazlan Mansor. In total there were about 144 participants.

Everyone proceeded to the Luncheon Hall where the Honorable Governor of Melaka Tuan Yang Terutama Yang Dipertua Negeri Melaka Tun Datuk. Seri Utama Mohd. Khalil Bin Yaakob graced the luncheon and sang a couple of songs. During the luncheon the CPO of Melaka thanked FusionExcel International for their kind contribution to make this event a success. Mr. Jean Daniels and FusionExcel Leader Mr. Julian Foo presented the mock cheque of RM 10,000 to the CPO of Melaka as well as FusionExcel products to The Honorable Governor of Melaka, The Honorable Director of CCID Commissioner Of Police Dato' Koh Hong Sun, the Honorable Director of Law and Order Commissioner of Police Dato’ Husin Ismail, The Honorable Mayor of Melaka Tuan Yusof B. Jantan and The Honorable CPO of Melaka SAC I Datuk Mazlan. Mr. Jean Daniels also presented a Quantum Pendant to the Honorable Deputy OCCI of Melaka Supt Hamdan Majid (The Organizing Chairman). Mr. Jean Daniels again demonstrated how FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant is effective for golfers especially how they can get extra strength, good balance and flexibility. 4 of the guests lifted a heavy man easily using the Quantum Pendant and the Honorable Governor of Melaka was impressed with the demonstration. The Honorable Governor of Melaka was also impressed with Mr. Julian Foo's nicely decorated Quantum Pendant and he requested Mr. Julian to decorate his Quantum Pendant ! 

Mr. Julian Foo was given the honor to give away the lucky draw prizes including the Quantum Watches (won by Encik Mohd Asri) and the Quantum Spa (won by Encik Abdul Razak).

A BIG THANK YOU TO FusionExcel!
